The La Salle Explorers defeated the Massachusetts Minutemen 78-71 in their March 12, 2025, Atlantic 10 Conference Tournament game[1][9][10][11]. The game occurred as scheduled with no postponement or cancellation. Corey McKeithan led La Salle with 30 points, while Daniel Rivera (22 points) and Jaylen Curry (18 points) were top performers for Massachusetts[9][10].

- Final score: La Salle 78, Massachusetts 71[1][9][10]  
- The game was part of the A-10 Tournament’s first round at Capital One Arena[9][11]
